Module it.polimi.ingsw.am13
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am13.client.network.rmi

Class GameListenerClientRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am13.client.network.rmi.GameListenerClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListenerClientRMIIF, Serializable, Remote
public class GameListenerClientRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameListenerClientRMIIF
Client-side listener for RMI connection. It is a remote object, and it should be exposed by the client by passing it when it connects to the room/game. It handles the updates the server sends to the clients, by modifying the view and updating the internal game's state
See Also:

    • updateStartGame

      public void updateStartGame(GameState state, GameControllerRMIIF controller) throws RemoteException
      The game has started: starter cards and initial cards have been given to the players. The specified model contains the initial set up for the started game. This triggers also the beginning of the thread for sending pings
      Specified by:
      updateStartGame in interface GameListenerClientRMIIF
      Parameters:
      state - The current game state when the method is called
      controller - Controller of the newly started game
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • updateGameModel

      public void updateGameModel(GameState state, GameControllerRMIIF controller, PlayerLobby player) throws RemoteException
      This method should be called once the player has reconnected to an already started game. It updates the entire game's state, i.e. it creates a new game's state starting from the specified model (reconstructing the current situation in game).
      Specified by:
      updateGameModel in interface GameListenerClientRMIIF
      Parameters:
      state - The current game state when the method is called
      player - Player for whom the update of game model is send
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      public void updateEndGame() throws RemoteException
